messages.subject: RK Saitou + astronomy
messages.msgSnippet: Historical SAitou was born in the year of the dragon. http://japan.chez.tiscali.fr/Horoscope/Japan/horoscope.htm now the animal zodiac also has more specific
messages.messageBody:
Historical SAitou was born in the year of the dragon.
http://japan.chez.tiscali.fr/Horoscope/Japan/horoscope.htm
now the animal zodiac also has more specific profiles and associates
the animal zodiac with the elements...

I believe that <RK> Saitou is a Metal Dragon...
http://www.chinavoc.com/zodiac/dragon/five.asp
